@@ -173,0 +173,3 @@
+            // We may enter a new nested event loop while we are leaving another one which is not yet left.
+            // Therefore, this nested event loop will prevent the current nested event loop from leaving.
+            leavingNestedEventLoop = false;
@@ -197,1 +200,0 @@
-

@@ -354,0 +354,3 @@ + *

Note: The nested event loop is not left immediately, but in the next event cycle. + * When entering a new nested event loop right after calling this method, this nested event loop will wait + * until the new inner nested event loop is left as well.

@@ -322,0 +322,3 @@ + *

Note: The nested event loop is not left immediately, but in the next event cycle. + * When entering a new nested event loop right after calling this method, this nested event loop will wait + * until the new inner nested event loop is left as well.
